casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Brandon M. CAPLES.
State of North Carolina
v.
Christopher G. Mitchell. No. 512P05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 19, 2006. Steven M. Arbogast, Jonathan P. Babb, Special Deputy Attorney Generals, Robert F. Johnson, District Attorney, for State of NC. M. Alexander Charns, Durham, for Brandon M. Caples. Paul Pooley, for Christopher G. Mitchell.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the conditional petition filed on the 23rd day of September 2005 by Defendant in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 19th day of December 2006."
